NAME: Loli
AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Search https://lolibooru.moe/ for loli pictures.

Usage: [p]loli [tags...]: Fetch the latest image
[p]lolir [tags...]: Fetch a random image
[p]lolifilter list: Lists all filters applied to the server
[p]lolifilter add [filter name]: Add a filter to the server
[p]lolifilter del [filter name]: Delete a filter from the server

Disclaimer: By default this cog does not display NSFW content, but it is able to through setting filters.
